Curious, data-driven and emerging tech enthusiast.
I'm Faheem, a UI/UX Designer with over 1 years of hands-on experience in User Experience, Product Analytics and Strategic Thinking.
Currently, I'm designing experiences that utilize AI/ML to improve data visualization, predictive modelling, and insights, transforming complex problems into innovative solutions at Qlik.
My journey began at the age of 12 when I was already reporting bugs in an MS-DOS operating system to programmers. At 16, as a self-taught, I designed my first web project, discovering my passion for this craft, which I decided to pursue further. Since then, I've had the opportunity to collaborate across diverse industry sectors and leading cross-functional teams, always prioritizing data-driven decisions.
I find inspiration in a cosmopolitan environment, appreciate Cubist art, and fuel my daily drive with a double espresso. In my spare time, you can find me devising fun tricks with my children, engaging in social projects that I am passionate about, playing tennis, or simply planning my next trip.
Curious to see and hear more?
